title: Kepler's Third Law Formula
text: Kepler's Third Law in terms of the orbital period T, gravitational constant G, and the mass of the Sun $$M_{sun}$$ is $$T^2=\frac{4{\pi}^2 R^3}{G M_{sun}}$$.

title: Substitute Values and Calculate
text: Now, we can substitute the values into the formula $$M_{sun}=\frac{4{\pi}^2 R^3}{G T^2}$$. to find the Sun’s mass in kilograms, and then convert it into units of $${10}^{30}$$ kg.
